question: 聴者
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>listen</kanji> <kanji>someone</kanji>, is someone who listens. This is a <vocabulary>listener</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic:
This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.

For this word, most often you'll hear the word <ja>リスナー</ja> but this is a kanji learning site, so you're going to be learning yourself some kanji, you hear?
